text: Ej zanoni Pajomʙar, şumo dar manzalatu ʙuzurgī monandi digar zanon nested, agar az Alloh ʙitarsed ʙo içro namudani farmudahojaş va dur ʙudan az nofarmonihojaş, pas, ʙa odamoni nomahram ʙa narmī suxan magūed, to on marde, ki dar qalʙi ū maraze ast, ʙa tama' aftad. Va suxani pisandida ʙigūed, ki on dur az şak va tiʙqi şariat ʙoşad
